name: Binarium V1.0
description:
Binarium is a smart hacker and he works at Xant.INC.
Xant.INC is a company who developed advanced technology that permit humans to control any kind of nature object and device.

His boss Vector, tested with Binarium his ultimate weapon which is a chamber of binary, a chamber that can transform any living or inanimate object into binary code automated device.

So control Binarium into his adventure and try to hack everything you can. Can you hack everything?
